price: 32. Mpe tango balobaki ete: Eh Nkolo! Soki likambo oyo ezali bosoló penza ewuti epai nayo, Nokisela biso mabanga na likolo lokola mbula, to óyela biso etumbu mosusu ya makasi koleka.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالُواْ ٱللَّهُمَّ إِن كَانَ هَٰذَا هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِنۡ عِندِكَ فَأَمۡطِرۡ عَلَيۡنَا حِجَارَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَوِ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qālū al-lahuma in kāna hādhā huwa al-ḥaqa min ʿindika fa-amṭir ʿalaynā ḥijāratan mina al-samāi awi i'tinā biʿadhābin alīmin
